snippet: The XOXO Fest in Portland, Ore., this weekend raised money using Kickstarter. Its methods are a theme for the music festival/start-up conference.
abstract: The XOXO Fest in Portland, Ore., this weekend raised money using Kickstarter. Its methods are a theme for the music festival/start-up conference.

headline.main: XOXO Fest, An Experimental Tech Conference, Gets Underway
